org.thegalactic.lattice.io

Class ImplicationalSystemSerializerText

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.thegalactic.lattice.io.ImplicationalSystemSerializerText
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Reader<ImplicationalSystem>, Writer<ImplicationalSystem>

    public final class ImplicationalSystemSerializerText
extends Object
implements Reader<ImplicationalSystem>, Writer<ImplicationalSystem>

    This class defines the way for reading an implicational system from a text file.

    • Method Summary

      • getInstance

        public static ImplicationalSystemSerializerText getInstance()

        Return the singleton instance of this class.

        Returns:
        the singleton instance

      • register

        public static void register()

        Register this class for reading and writing .txt files.

      • read

        public void read(ImplicationalSystem system,
                 BufferedReader file)
          throws IOException

        Saves this component in a file.

        The following format is used:

        An implicational system can be instancied from and save to a text file in the following format: A list of elements separated by a space in the first line ; then, each rule on a line, written like [premise] -> [conclusion] where elements are separated by a space.

        a b c d e
a b -> c d
c d -> e
        Specified by:
        read in interface Reader<ImplicationalSystem>
        Parameters:
        system - a system to read
        file - a file
        Throws:
        IOException - When an IOException occurs

      • write

        public void write(ImplicationalSystem system,
                  BufferedWriter file)
           throws IOException

        Saves this component in a file.

        The following format is used:

        An implicational system can be instancied from and save to a text file in the following format: A list of elements separated by a space in the first line ; then, each rule on a line, written like [premise] -> [conclusion] where elements are separated by a space.

        a b c d e
a b -> c d
c d -> e
        Specified by:
        write in interface Writer<ImplicationalSystem>
        Parameters:
        system - a system to write
        file - a file
        Throws:
        IOException - When an IOException occurs
